channel.title: News on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in News on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: PrestaShop Developer Conference 2025 Filmed Sessions - AI and Productivity
item.description: The third PrestaShop Developer Conference took place in November 2025: two weeks ago, we started publishing a series of blog posts diving into the event’s sessions, sharing insights and key takeaways with you. Last week, we spotlighted modern development practices and architectural approaches. This week, we’re continuing the series with a focus on artificial intelligence and productivity.

item.title: PrestaShop Developer Conference 2025 Filmed Sessions - Modern Development Practices and Architecture
item.description: The PrestaShop Developer Conference took place a few months ago: last week, we’ve started publishing a series of blog posts diving into the event’s sessions, sharing insights and key takeaways with you. We are continuing the series with another spotlight on modern development practices and architectural approaches.

item.title: PrestaShop 9.1 Beta is open for feedback!
item.description: PrestaShop 9.1 Beta is here, and it includes several major improvements that you can already start exploring and sharing feedback on. Your input is valuable for the final release of PrestaShop 9.1.

item.title: PrestaShop Developer Conference 2025 - Filmed Morning Sessions and Q&A Now Available
item.description: The PrestaShop Developer Conference happened a few weeks ago, and this year’s edition brought together our vibrant community for a day packed with technical insights, product announcements, and open discussions about the future of PrestaShop. Over the coming weeks, we’ll be publishing a series of blog posts, similar to this one, diving into the event’s sessions, giving you insights and takeaways. Each post will spotlight different talks and themes from the conference.

item.title: PrestaShop 2025: Year in Review
item.description: As 2025 comes to a close, it’s time to reflect on an incredible year for the PrestaShop project. From the highly anticipated release of PrestaShop 9 to the vibrant gatherings at FOP Days and the Developer Conference, this year has been defined by innovation, collaboration, and the unwavering dedication of our community.

item.title: PrestaShop 9.1 is in feature freeze
item.description: As of December 12th, 2025, PrestaShop version 9.1 has entered the feature freeze phase. Learn more about the feature freeze, the next steps, and what’s coming in PrestaShop 9.1.

item.title: PrestaShop Developer Conference 2025 - Event Recap
item.description: On November 19, 2025, the PrestaShop developer community convened in Paris, and online via a global livestream, for the third PrestaShop Developer Conference. The program featured hands-on sessions, live demonstrations, and expert talks, alongside a major announcement. Attendees deepened their understanding of the PrestaShop ecosystem, gained project information, and explored practical advancements they can apply in their daily work.

item.title: PrestaShop Developer Conference 2025: Register now!
item.description: The ecommerce world is advancing at an exciting pace, creating fresh opportunities for developers and businesses. That’s why we are excited to announce the third edition of the PrestaShop Developer Conference, taking place on November 19, 2025, in Paris and, for the first time, online.

item.title: Call for Speakers: PrestaShop Developer Conference Returns in November 2025
item.description: We are very excited to announce that the call for presentations is now open for the third edition of the PrestaShop Developer Conference, taking place in Paris on November 19, 2025, in a hybrid format, with both onsite and online attendance options.

item.title: PSDevCon2024: Cybersecurity – What No One Dares to Say
item.description: Application security is often a forgotten aspect of the digital world. Everyone agrees that it is essential, but no one really wants to face its consequences. Today, in this guest blog post, it’s time to share the truths that no one wants to say.

item.title: FOP Days 2025 - a wrap-up
item.description: The 2025 edition of Friends of Presta (FOP) Days has come to an end, leaving behind two days of discussions, technical insights, and networking. Held on March 26-27 at Le Nida in Issy-les-Moulineaux, the event brought together developers, agencies, and ecommerce professionals from the PrestaShop community.

item.title: PSDevCon 2024 - testing and analyzing your PrestaShop modules automatically
item.description: During the PrestaShop Developer Conference 2024, Jonathan Danse presented methods for automatically testing and analyzing modules, ensuring their quality and reliability. In this guest article, Jonathan shares the key points from his conference and offers practical advice. Learn how to ensure high-performing modules with every deployment.

item.title: PSDevCon 2024 - PUIK (PrestaShop UI Kit) - The new UI kit from PrestaShop
item.description: During the second PrestaShop Developer Conference on November 6, 2024, I was able to introduce PUIK (PrestaShop UI Kit) to participants. This blog post provides a written summary of the presentation. During the talk, the audience gained a clearer understanding of PrestaShop’s UI Kit, based on the new PrestaShop Design System. Learn how this library aims to provide a complete set of reusable components for the entire PrestaShop ecosystem. The GitHub repository is available here.

item.title: Event Synopsis - PrestaShop Developer Conference 2024
item.description: On November 6, 2024, the PrestaShop developer community gathered in Paris for a day of learning and networking at the second PrestaShop Developer Conference. The agenda was filled with insightful sessions and demonstrations. The event provided a platform to grow and learn more about PrestaShop’s ecosystem, get project information as well as explore advancements usable in daily professional activities.

item.title: Register Now for the PrestaShop Developer Conference 2024
item.description: The world of ecommerce is constantly evolving, and staying on top of the latest trends and innovations is essential for developers and businesses. That’s why we are thrilled to invite you to the second edition of the PrestaShop Developer Conference, taking place on November 6, 2024, in Paris.
